paragraph:
To run the game, just enter:docker run --rm -ti unknow/devops_nightmare- there is no instruction
 - take a look and find out what to do...It's something like escape room, but inside a docker container.99% of CLI tools are REMOVED - try to achieve everything in DIFFERENT way.
Share you thoughts about the game - thx.Have fun & good luck!But hey, it was really entertaining so keep up the good work and let me know if you decide to make another one. :)
